medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive exertional dyspnea and exercise intolerance limiting activities of daily living.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms experienced since childhood, progressively worsening over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recently diagnosed bilateral sensorineural hearing loss, bilateral primary open-angle glaucoma, and inappropriate sinus tachycardia.
medical_history.family_history: Notable for consanguinity but unremarkable for cardiac or genetic disorders.
